item.title: Syntax Highlighting in Hugo with Markdown
item.description: If you’re like me, you prefer writing Markdown instead of HTML for most things. Whether its writing a message on Slack, editing README’s on GitHub, posting Q/A’s on Stackoverflow, or most any other platform that supports Markdown. Its just plain simple and easy to use.
